definition: to repeat errors/to continue blundering/to make continuous mistakes
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
surname Cuo
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
surname Cuo

sentences.english: At least we won’t make that mistake again, right?
sentences.chinese: 至少我們不能一錯再錯了，對嗎？

sentences.english: If money is also a kind of wrong, I will repeat one's mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 如果有錢也是一種錯，那我情願一錯再錯。

sentences.english: Do not repeat the mistakes again hurt others.
sentences.chinese: 不要一錯再錯的傷害別人。

sentences.english: In blind error when I did persever.
sentences.chinese: 我卻盲目地一錯再錯入歧途。

sentences.english: Where Does My Love Go Wrong?
Were I wrong to love you, I'd rather be wrong repeatedly.
sentences.chinese: 如果愛你是一種錯，我寧願一錯再錯。

sentences.english: It is Japan that provoked the issue and made mistakes one after another that led to the escalation.
sentences.chinese: 是日方挑起事端，一錯再錯，導致事態升級。

definition: outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
to be drowned (figurative and literal)
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
to keep silent
to be determined to win (idiom)
idle gossip
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
unexpected misfortune/unexpected accident/sudden death
fight to the death/desperate struggle
Cona county, Tibetan: Mtsho sna rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
the content of a conversation/words/remarks
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
to feel embarrassed/to feel akward
